channel.title: Mac Comp crashed
channel.description:
My brother's mac air has crashed, probably from obtaining a virus downloading music.
So, does anyone know how easy it is for macs to get viruses?
Has this happened to anyone?
Discuss.

item.title: Mac Comp crashed
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Many people say Mac can’t be hacked or given a virus but that is a lie… Any OS could be given a virus, but since most of the computers in the world use Windows no one is really trying to hunt for the lower percentage OS’s like Linux and Mac…

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Comp crashed
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Go to your closest Apple Store and tell them to fix it if you have warranty.

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Comp crashed
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Not many people here have the money to go and spend on a mac when they would prefer linux. Try asking over at MITB, but they are more prominent for Linux than we are, although some of them most likely have tested Hackintosh (mac OS for pc), and should be able to give you more assistance with the Mac issue.

My opinion - Never go mac, its only good for media and professional use, Linux for programmers, and Windows for home. Bout all the advice I can give you on that lmfao.

Read full topic
